Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Stewart
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stewart, Marquette, Halsted and 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Stewart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Stewart, Marquette, Halsted and 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Stewart.

Allow extra travel time.
